title: Where can i find Visual Basic Image Internal Structure Format by Alex Ionescu?
content:
Where i can find a working link to this tutorial? I have searched a lot on the net but all links are broken. Could anyone upload it somewhere?
Original link
http://www.alex-ionescu.com/vb.pdf

comments.text: Ever heard of the Wayback Machine? It's there. As is (presumably) everything else.
Sorry i don't know that website. What's wrong with asking? why negative thumb? Thanks for your help.
web.archive.org/web*/alex-ionescu.com/vb.pdf (and thank you for not assuming this was me downvoting)
